name: Lokalinc
overview: Lokalinc is an initiative to support local entrepreneurs and bring unique services and products under the attention of people living in and around Amsterdam. Lokalinc keeps you up to date and inspired by showcasing the most interesting products from local stores in Amsterdam. We directly link your interests to local entrepreneurs in and around your neighborhood. We all know local entrepreneurs make a city/neighborhood vibrant and give it its own character. Unfortunately small shop owners often struggle because of heavy competition with bigger chains. The weekly Lokalinc magazine keeps you informed about special offers, unique products and events from only the best local entrepreneurs in your own city and neighborhood.
